constituent: ascend, teepee, wigwam, beans, table, one, mouth
koohiiStory1: When an American Indian warrior dies, his body is placed on a TABLE inside a TEEPEE, and a ritualistic ceremony is held to encourage his spirit to ASCEND to that big buffalo hunting ground in the sky.
koohiiStory2: When I was a kid I went out camping in a teepee. I ate beans for dinner, and afterwards I produced so much gas that my teepee actually ascended in the air!
onYomi: トウ、ト、ドウ、ショウ、チョウ
readingExamples: 登壇 (とうだん), 登校 (とうこう), 登記 (とうき), 登る (のぼ.る)
words: entry (on stage), appearance (on screen), entrance, introduction (into a market)
